patchNotes.title: Talent Rework

texts.text: Additional functionality: Warchief pride -> Taunting up to 1.5 seconds after a takedown heals Garrosh 25% of his maximum health on the end.
subtexts: Enemies will have vision of Garrosh when he is taunting even if it's on cooldown.
This is the game taunt button which show mastery button not to be confused with <vanilla, abilities,  heroic, 0>

general.developerCommentary: A brutal leader that wants to intimidate the enemy should have the possibility to do it.

patchNotes.developerCommentary: Im leveling up the Garrosh bringing him new ways to become the prideful warchief he is

texts.text: For every 2% missing maximum health Garrosh receive 3% extra attack speed
Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of <modified, abilities,  basic, 1> by 1 second.

changes.name: New: Bull rush

texts.text: Garrosh runs in a straigh line, knockbacking enemies that enters on contact with him.
subtexts: Range will be 7.0 | <vanilla, abilities,  basic, 2, valla> has 5.0 range | <vanilla, abilities,  basic, 2, muradin> has 8.0 range
Missile Speed will be 15 | <vanilla, abilities,  basic, 2, valla> is 14 | <vanilla, abilities,  basic, 2, muradin> is 30
Cast needs to be finished before being to cast skills

changes.developerCommentary: Even tho this gives Garrosh great mobility it's on cost of not getting cleanse also it's on par with the character angry style.

changes.name: New: Groundbreaking tactics

texts.text: <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> can now be channeled for up to 2 seconds, increasing the outer area radius up to 40%. If channeled to Maximum enemies will be pulled towards Garrosh instead of stunned

changes.developerCommentary: Inspired on Sion Decimating Smash and justify the old garrosh interaction being gatekeeped by maximum channeling and by not picking cleanse

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 4, 0>, <vanilla, talents, 4, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: I see no purpose for <vanilla, talents, 4, 0> with the new talent <modified, talents,  1, 2> as it takes the same effect and <vanilla, talents, 4, 1> is really niche and i don't think it fits Garrosh, not the non-heroic killing but the spammable non-heroic style

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 0>

texts.text: Additional functionality: Not hitting Heroes on the <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> Outer Radius reduces the cooldown by 2 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: This could be considered strong as Intimidation is a niche talent BUT i want you to propositally miss the outer radius sometimes just for attack speed reduction.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 7, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: <modified, abilities,  basic, 3> target throw target stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.25 seconds, if the target throw is a non-heroic unit reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: I want to bring a utility for throwing minions instead of only a mistake.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 13, 2> renamed to Don't let them run

texts.text: Changed functionality: Increase Garrosh movement speed by 1% every 4% missing health capping at 15%. This Talent only take effect if there's an visible enemy hero close to Garrosh.
subtexts: 8 radius | <vanilla, abilities,  heroic, 1, blaze> has 6.5 radius

changes.developerCommentary: One thing that i always wanted was a talent to make Garrosh pursuing better especially on a <vanilla, abilities,  heroic, 1> focused build

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 1, 2>

texts.text: Changed functionality: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target. If used on an enemy that used dash related mechanics within the last 3 seconds will cause 400% more damage and stuns the target for 0.25 seconds while reducing it's cooldown to 4 seconds.

changes.developerCommentary: Garrosh is a character that suffers a lot against mobility characters and this talent itself still not make it eazy for Garrosh to deal with this weaklings BUT turns him into a menace if he gets in range and making the kill eazy. After reading some feedback on reddit i came in the Illidan situation as the original version was supposed to be exhaustion i changed it to still be related to dashes but damage focused.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 16, 1>
changes.developerCommentary: With the changes to <modified, abilities,  basic, 3> there's no need anymore for that talent

changes.name: New: Gorehowl

texts.text: After Garrosh uses <modified, abilities,  basic, 0>, three additional waves are created sequentially from the edge of the original area. Each wave deals 81 damage and stuns enemies for 0.5 seconds.
subtexts: Additional waves are affected by groundbreaking tactics size increase but WILL pull the enemies.
Imagine something  close to the <vanilla, abilities,  basic, 1, sonya>

changes.developerCommentary: I wanted to empower <modified, abilities,  basic, 0> somehow and this, this is good. I really like the concept of Angry Garrosh simply destroying the ground angry as he is and it also feels like an level 20 talent.

changes.name: <vanilla, talents, 20, 3>
changes.developerCommentary: I dislike talents that forces it to be picked with other if you want to use them like the Leoric level 13,16 talents on the vanilla game and i hate it even more when it forces you to pick a talent to use it.
